analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs la ni de dag gi dngos por med par nges par bya ba'o //

analyzed: de la bhur ni sa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'o //

original: sa ni rang gi ngo bo ste bhu ba ste /
analyzed: sa ni rang gi ngo bo ste bhu ba ste /
translated: Earth is one's own nature, bhuva.

original: bhur wa sva zhes bya ba 'di'i don yin no //
analyzed: bhur wa sva zhes bya ba 'di'i don yin no //
translated: This is the meaning of bhurva sva.

analyzed: 'di nas @124b bzung nas zhes bya ba de ni rtogs par bya ba'i don de dbugs dbyung ba'o //

original: shes rab dang dad pa'i zhing du bya ba'i phyir dang / dam tshig bsrung pa'i phyir gnyi gas dus mnyam du bsrung pa'i byang chub kyi sems rab tu sbyin pa ni gsang pa'i dbang bskur ba ste /

translated: In order to make him a field of wisdom and faith, and in order to protect the commitments, both of them together protect the bodhicitta, which is the secret empowerment.

original: thabs dang shes rab kyi gsang ba dag sbyin par bya'o zhes khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyi gsang ba dag sbyin par bya'o zhes khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: You should understand that the secret of method and wisdom should be given.

translated: The wisdom-knowledge should be understood here as nondual knowledge.

original: shes rab nyid ye shes so //
analyzed: shes rab nyid ye shes so //
translated: The wisdom-knowledge or wisdom itself is knowledge.

original: de la gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i blos khams bzhi dang / phung po lnga dang / gzugs pa sogs pa yul drug gi bdag nyid can gyi yan lag dang / nying lag gi ngo bo ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: de la gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i blos khams bzhi dang / phung po lnga dang / gzugs pa sogs pa yul drug gi bdag nyid can gyi yan lag dang / nying lag gi ngo bo ni shes rab ste /
translated: Therein, the wisdom is the nature of the four elements, the five aggregates, and the major and minor body parts that are the nature of the six objects, such as form, by the mind that conceives of the difference between percept and perceiver.

original: de rgyu mtshan du gyur pa las byung ba byang chub kyi sems so zhes khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de rgyu mtshan du gyur pa las byung ba byang chub kyi sems so zhes khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: You should understand that the bodhicitta that arises from that as the reason is the secret empowerment.

original: gzhan dag ni de nyid rnam pa gnyis pos stong pa nyid don dam pa'i rnam par shes pas khong du chud par bya'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni de nyid rnam pa gnyis pos stong pa nyid don dam pa'i rnam par shes pas khong du chud par bya'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say that the meaning of the fourth is that the other two realities should be understood through ultimate consciousness, which is empty of the two kinds of self.

original: shes rab ye shes kyis mtshon par gyur pa yan lag bdud pa dang ldan pa'i bsgrub par bya ba bzhin pa'i don yin no zhes gzhan dag 'dod do //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes kyis mtshon par gyur pa yan lag bdud pa dang ldan pa'i bsgrub par bya ba bzhin pa'i don yin no zhes gzhan dag 'dod do //
translated: Others assert that the meaning of the fourth is that the ultimate is the object to be accomplished, endowed with the seven limbs, indicated by the wisdom initiation.

original: gzhan dag ni shes rab ye shes nyid goms par byas pa las ston ka'i dri ma med pa'i nam ma mkha'i dkyil lta bu ni bzhi ba'i don yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni shes rab ye shes nyid goms par byas pa las ston ka'i dri ma med pa'i nam ma mkha'i dkyil lta bu ni bzhi ba'i don yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say that the meaning of the fourth is that the ultimate is the wisdom initiation itself, which is like the stainless sky of autumn when it is cultivated.

original: yang gzhan dag ni shes rab ye shes kyi rang bzhin gnyug ma'i rnam par gyur pa'i gzugs rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i bdag nyid can gyi zung du 'jug pa 'byung bar shin du rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin ni bzhi pa'i don yin no zhes zer ro
analyzed: yang gzhan dag ni shes rab ye shes kyi rang bzhin gnyug ma'i rnam par gyur pa'i gzugs rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i bdag nyid can gyi zung du 'jug pa 'byung bar shin du rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin ni bzhi pa'i don yin no zhes zer ro
translated: Others say that the meaning of the fourth is the union that arises from the natural, innate form of the wisdom initiation, which has the nature of dependent origination and is of the nature of complete purity.

original: ; / phyogs gzhan dang gzhan ni gzhung mngas pa'i 'jigs pas ma brjod do //
analyzed: ; / phyogs gzhan dang gzhan ni gzhung mngas pa'i 'jigs pas ma brjod do //
